page.title: 20CUB SCOUTS IN KELVEDON
page.content: {Cubs}are held at the Scout hut which is near our school. I am in a pack called{"Eagles"}which has meetings every Tuesday at 6.15 p.m. There's another pack called{"Panthers"}who meet on Thursday. Before you can be a cub you have to be{"Invested".}This is a small ceremony when you say your Law and Promise. After a while you become a seconder and you are given a badge to wear on your right arm. A little later you get your sixer badge which goes under your seconder badge. There are many activity badges to do like:- fishing, sportsman, swimming, animal lover, home-help and many more. Each year we go to camp where we cook our meals over a camp-fire. We cook sausages, baked beans, bacon and eggs. Each month the six with the most points wins the gold woggles.
